mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure images are optimized for faster loading on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Reduce the size of image files and leverage browser caching to improve page load speed.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more keyword-rich headings and alt text to images for better search engine indexing.
userExperienceTip: Consider adding a sticky navigation bar for easier site navigation on all pages.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing the number of steps to complete a reservation.
